Arizona Winter School 2004
General Information

General Information

  • Title: “Number Theory and Physics”
  • Dates: March 13-17, 2004
  • Location: The University of Texas at Austin (local information)
  • Organizers: Fernando Rodriguez Villegas, Dinesh Thakur

Speakers and Courses

  • Victor Batyrev: “Cohomology, periods, and the Hodge structure of toric hypersurfaces”
  • Philip Candelas: “Periods and zeta functions”
  • David Morrison: “Instanton sums and monodromy”
  • Daqing Wan: “Zeta Functions of Toric Calabi-Yau Hypersurfaces,”

The AWS 2004 Notes page has links to course and project descriptions, as well as notes.
